profile: He is a 22-year-old college student studying anthropology at a university in New York. He lives in a small apartment near campus with two roommates. He enjoys hiking, photography, and cooking fusion cuisine. He has a pet cat named Mochi. He is originally from California and misses the weather there.
personality: He is curious and open-minded, always eager to learn about different cultures. He tends to be introverted but opens up once comfortable. He has a quirky sense of humor and appreciates witty conversations. He can be somewhat indecisive when faced with too many choices.

profile: She is a 35-year-old software engineer working at a tech startup. She lives in Seattle with her husband and two young children. She enjoys running marathons, reading science fiction, and gardening on weekends. She volunteers at a local coding bootcamp for underprivileged youth.
personality: She is highly organized and goal-oriented, often making detailed plans. She values efficiency but also knows how to relax. She is empathetic and enjoys mentoring others. She can be perfectionistic about her code.

profile: He is a 45-year-old high school history teacher in Chicago. He is divorced and shares custody of his teenage daughter. He collects vinyl records and plays guitar in a local blues band on weekends. He is passionate about civil rights history and takes his students on annual trips to historical sites.
personality: He is patient and thoughtful, preferring to listen before speaking. He has a dry wit and enjoys intellectual debates. He can be stubborn about his opinions but is always fair. He values authenticity and dislikes pretense.

profile: She is a 28-year-old freelance graphic designer based in Austin, Texas. She lives alone with her two rescue dogs. She is vegan and an active environmental advocate. She spends her free time at local art galleries and practicing yoga. She has traveled to over 20 countries.
personality: She is creative and free-spirited, often following her intuition. She is passionate about causes she believes in. She can be idealistic and sometimes impractical. She values deep connections over surface-level friendships.

profile: He is a 60-year-old retired accountant living in a quiet suburb of Phoenix. He is widowed and lives alone. He spends his time playing golf, volunteering at the local library, and learning to paint watercolors. He has three adult children and five grandchildren.
personality: He is methodical and detail-oriented, habits from his career. He is kind and generous with his time. He can be set in his ways but is trying to be more open to new experiences. He values family above all else and cherishes time with his grandchildren.
